product_name: JayBird BlueBuds X Premium Bluetooth Earbuds
long_description: Snug, micro-size Jaybird BlueBuds X Premium Bluetooth Earbuds rewrite the standard for Bluetooth(R) audio, delivering outstanding performance that rivals the best in mainstream wired headphones. Outperforming most wired headphones, Shift Bluetooth audio produces premium sound and warm bass; PureSound in-ear white noise reduction eliminates listener fatigue. The official training headphones of the USA Triathlon, these proven endurance sport headphones have a patented secure fit for sports. Wireless music plus calls with complete remote control; "Jenna" offers voice prompts for easy use. X-Fit over/under ear fit options; over-ear lifts cord off neck, liberating your workout. SignalPlus lets you use music device anywhere on your body for skip-free music outdoors. BatteryHD provides heavy-duty playtime of up to 8 hours. Jaybird BlueBuds X Premium Bluetooth Earbuds are protected by Liquipel Sweat Repellant Nano technology.
short_description: Snug, micro-size Jaybird BlueBuds X Premium Bluetooth Earbuds rewrite the standard for Bluetooth(R) audio, delivering outstanding performance that rivals the best in mainstream wired headphones.
